org.dyn4j.dynamics

Class Constraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.dynamics.Constraint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContactConstraint, Joint

    public abstract class Constraint
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents some physical constraint between a pair of Bodys.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.1
    Author:
    William Bittle

      • shiftCoordinates

        protected abstract void shiftCoordinates(Vector2 shift)
        Shifts (translates) the coordinates of this constraint.

        Typically this method should not be called directly. Instead use the World.shiftCoordinates(Vector2) method to move the entire world.

        Parameters:
        shift - the distance to shift along the x and y axes
        Since:
        3.1.0

      • setOnIsland

        protected void setOnIsland(boolean onIsland)
        Sets the on Island flag to the given value.
        Parameters:
        onIsland - true if the Constraint has been added to an Island
